## Install `llm`

``` bash
uv tool install llm
```

## Install provider extensions (optional)

``` bash
llm install \
    llm-deepseek \  # To use Deepseek models
    llm-gemini \    # To use Google models
    llm-openrouter  # For multi-provider access with one API key
```

## Set provider API key(s)

``` bash
llm keys set openai
```
